searchEngine

Class TextBaseContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • searchEngine.TextBaseContentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler

    public class TextBaseContentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
    This class provides a Handler to parse text database XML files using a SAX parser. Files must follow this format : 000001 Preliminary Report-International Algebraic Language 000002 Extraction of Roots by Repeated Subtractions for Digital Computers ... where DOCNO is the identifier of a document and the TEXT tags indicate the content of the documents.
    Author:
    Pierre Tirilly - pierre.tirilly@telecom-lille.fr
